Summary: 3 orange glowing UFOs flying in a triangle then one by one the lights faded.
divs: Sighting Details3 flying orange lights flying in a triangle than they made a left hand turn one by one the lights faded we watched them for 5 min. it was very strange way above the three orange lights there was a airplane we could see the flashing lights, we just have no idea what the 3 oragne lights were
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Imlay City
There were no other sightings in Imlay City on or around June 21st 2009
